rooms.description: Open-plan living area adjacent to the kitchen and dining area.
Luxury bedroom with ample natural light.
Additional premium bedroom incorporating Vastu recommendations for personal growth.
Dedicated home theater area with acoustics and optimal screen placement.
Modern kitchen with integrated appliances and storage in compliance with Indian residential norms.
Spacious dining area that connects to the living room for social gatherings.
Luxury swimming pool with adjacent changing rooms and seating areas.

openings.description: Main entrance adhering to North-facing Vastu principles for prosperity.
Balcony offering panoramic views, ensuring sunlight and ventilation as per Indian norms.
Large windows for ample natural light while aligning with local architectural practices.
